lead_paragraph: Temperatures abruptly plunged to a 16-year low of 39 degrees Fahrenheit in the subtropical capital.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Taiwan: Scores Die as Cold Descends
headline.main: Taiwan: Scores Die as Cold Descends

snippet: Temperatures abruptly plunged to a 16-year low of 39 degrees Fahrenheit in the subtropical capital.
abstract: Taiwanese officials attribute deaths of at least 57 people in greater Taipei area to unusual cold front that brought temperatures as low as 39 degrees; most of victims were seniors.
